column5: Sweet little two story 3bedroom 2.5 bath home in far South Austin. Located in a quiet and safe neighborhood close to shopping, restaurants, bus lines and parks. The house is shared with myself and my two very sweet tabby cats. Quiet and clean you have access to a private bathroom, shared living area and kitchen. The bedroom has one full size bed with shelves and a closet for your clothing along with a desk for getting some work done during your stay. I will be adding more photos very soon!
column8: Quiet, affordable, convenient in far South Austin
